# Eyes of the Avoral (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** Apostle of peace 1, [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], Beloved of Valarian 1, [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 99

The subject gains an avoralâ€™s sharp eyesight, receiving a +8 racial bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks for the duration of the spell.

*Eyes of the avoral* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
